description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Secure Channel Denial of Service vulnerability (CVE-2024-38148), apply the following updates to your systems:

1. Ensure your systems are running one of the supported Windows 11 versions.
2. Download and install the appropriate update package based on your system version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)
3. Restart your system after installation to apply the updates.

**Details**:
- This update resolves a critical denial of service vulnerability binding the component to the network stack, which could allow attackers to exploit it remotely without user interaction.
- Ensure backup of critical data before proceeding with the installation.
